## ðŸš€ Quick Install

1.  **Clone Repo into local computer.**

2.  **Run npm install.**

    To pull all packages from the cloud

    ```shell
    cd Panda-Eating-Lots/
    gatsby develop
    ```

1.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    You will see the app running at `http://localhost:8000`!

    _Note: You'll also see a second link: _`http://localhost:8000/___graphql`_. This is a tool you can use to experiment with querying your data. Learn more about using this tool in the [Gatsby tutorial](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/tutorial/part-five/#introducing-graphiql)._

    Open the `Panda-Eating-Lots` directory in your code editor of choice and edit `src/pages/index.js`. Save your changes and the browser will update in real time!


- **To also get started with Gatsby [to our documentation](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/docs/).** In particular, check out the _Guides_, _API Reference_, and _Advanced Tutorials_ sections in the sidebar.
